About Company
SkyzTech Ltd is focused on improving people\'s lives through meaningful innovation in the areas of Technology solutions

Employ is an app, maintained and run by SkyzTech Ltd for general maintenance of equipments/electrical and repair works for home office and buildings. we have skilled and qualified painters, repair flooring, and plumbers, electricians, air conditioning and heating repair and maintenance and other tasks
